heading: Blood Harvest and Hunter’s Acclaim – Season of Blood
content: Today we are going to talk about the new seasonal event and accompanying progression system, Blood Harvest and Hunter's Acclaim. During the , these systems were announced as part of the content added with Season 2, and they are critical to farm components to unlock and upgrade your Vampiric Powers. Let's dive in and slay some vampires, shall we. The Blood Harvest Seasonal Event is the main and best way to farm many items and for the Hunter's Acclaim (we'll talk about in a little bit). Starting right from Level 1, you will be able to open your map and find one of these Harvest Events taking place in a Zone anywhere in the world. They rotate between different Zones of different Regions (similar to how work). Unlike Helltides, they will always be a Harvest Event up, so you never have downtime and that FOMO feeling. As hinted at, a Blood Harvest is a great farming spot. You can farm for items such as: As you can see, Blood Harvest is an important activity to do. Not only is it a different activity, it enables you to get and upgrade your Vampiric Powers to maximize your build for the season. The Hunter's Acclaim is a seasonal progression system that unlocks a variety of rewards. As mentioned in the previous section, you earn by killing enemies during the Harvest Event and doing other activities, Local Events, etc. This unlocks higher Tier rewards.
